page.title: 07Transport
page.content: The main road carries an almost ceaseless flow of traffic to and from Gloucester especially on market days (Mondays and Thursdays) when you can see livestock carriers from the 2-small-animal size up to double-decker multi-animal ones.The bus route between the Forest of Dean and Gloucester runs along the main road here while away across the common is a railway-line carrying trains between Gloucester and Chepstow. Cyclists need care because of the narrowness of the road for the volume and speed of the traffic it carries and the "backwash" from the lorries.When the Severn Bridge is closed to high-sided vehicles because of strong winds,that traffic comes along our road if travelling between South Wales and the South-West of England or the London regions.
